languages.text: "Я бы на твоем месте сейчас крепко задумалась, что, в таком случае, ждет впереди тебя, невинная ты наша".
"You should think good and hard about what this might mean for you, our harmless xenos."
languages.original_text: "Я бы на твоем месте сейчас крепко задумалась, что, в таком случае, ждет впереди тебя, невинная ты наша".

traits.locale_text: "You should think good and hard about what this might mean for you, our harmless xenos."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You should think good and hard about what this might mean for you, our harmless xenos."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You should think good and hard about what this might mean for you, our harmless xenos."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You should think good and hard about what this might mean for you, our harmless xenos."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “你真该好好想想，这句话对你会不会也有某种特别的含义，我们‘人畜无害’的好异形。”
languages.original_text: "You should think good and hard about what this might mean for you, our harmless xenos."

traits.locale_text: “你真该好好想想，这句话对你会不会也有某种特别的含义，我们‘人畜无害’的好异形。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Vous devriez bien réfléchir à ce que ça implique pour vous, notre xénos inoffensive. »
languages.original_text: "You should think good and hard about what this might mean for you, our harmless xenos."

traits.locale_text: « Vous devriez bien réfléchir à ce que ça implique pour vous, notre xénos inoffensive. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Deberías pensar largo y tendido en lo que eso podría significar para ti, por mucho que seas inofensiva».
languages.original_text: "You should think good and hard about what this might mean for you, our harmless xenos."

traits.locale_text: «Deberías pensar largo y tendido en lo que eso podría significar para ti, por mucho que seas inofensiva».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「これが自分の身に起こることかもしれないって、よくよく考えたら。無害な異種族さん」
languages.original_text: "You should think good and hard about what this might mean for you, our harmless xenos."

traits.locale_text: 「これが自分の身に起こることかもしれないって、よくよく考えたら。無害な異種族さん」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr solltet gut darüber nachdenken, was das für Euch bedeuten könnte, unser harmloser Xenos."
languages.original_text: "You should think good and hard about what this might mean for you, our harmless xenos."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr solltet gut darüber nachdenken, was das für Euch bedeuten könnte, unser harmloser Xenos."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "You should think good and hard about what this might mean for you, our harmless xenos."

languages.text: "Bunun senin için ne ifade edebileceğini uzun uzadıya bir düşün zararsız zenocuğumuz."
languages.original_text: "You should think good and hard about what this might mean for you, our harmless xenos."

traits.locale_text: "Bunun senin için ne anlama gelebileceğini uzun uzadıya bir düşün zararsız zenomuz."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
